4.3.20  6:35 am   i've encountered a problem with melody/lyrics
i can't seem to write lyrics i'm happy with without a good melody, but i also can't seem to get a good melody without lyrics i'm happy with. only very rarely do these two events combine, and not as often as i need them to, any helpful ideas?
